review: Amazon Fire TV is a pretty sweet gadget. I love the fact that I can access all of my Prime media on the big screen now and my Netflix, etc. The only nit I have to pick is that the remote is a bit touchy. When you are entering text for account passwords or scrolling through selections it will frequently jump multiple spaces no matter how carefully you press the navigation ring. Voice search is pretty darn accurate and makes finding movies and songs a breeze.

review: People can talk all they want about what set top box is best. But seriously it is all a matter of preference. I think the amazon fire tv has the best interface, it looks good and it fits within a huge ecosystem. Biggest downer though is the search only works within the amazon prime tv not hulu or netflix. Not that big of an issue though since everything is super snappy and quick.
